content:
Go-ethereum, by itself is quite interesting. One cannot fathom different things it allows you to do.
1 2 3 4 5  def mythingies():  mythingies = 2*7  for r in ranges:  print("There have been many instances of ")  return mythingies   1 2 3  for(i = 0; i<200; i++) {  cout << "there" << endl; }

title: Exploring go-ethereum's secrets
